context_bundle.summary: Compliance Pattern: Centralized repository (certs, training, policies, access logs) -> Proactive monitoring (90/60/30 day alerts for expiring certs) -> Automated checks (required training by role, policy acknowledgments, access reviews quarterly) -> Risk-based alerting (critical: imminent expiration) -> Auto-reporting (daily critical, weekly status, quarterly regulatory). 100hr->10hr/month. $307K/yr value.

onboarding.quick_start: 1. Centralize all compliance data in SharePoint+Dataverse. 2. Alert 90/60/30 days before cert expiry. 3. Assign required training by role, track completion. 4. Quarterly access review workflow. 5. Auto-generate audit packages on demand.
common_patterns: Cert alerts: 90 day (info), 60 day (warning), 30 day (urgent), 0 day (critical escalate)
Training: Assign by role template, remind weekly until complete, escalate to manager at deadline
Access review: Quarterly pull -> Manager approve/revoke -> Auto-revoke if no response 2 weeks
Audit package: Query all relevant docs + logs + approvals -> compile to single PDF
known_errors: Cert renewal often external - can't auto-complete
Access review needs manager buy-in or becomes checkbox exercise
